WWWCLEAN(YROUTINE,YVARIABLE) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; SUCHEN NACH VARIABLEN DIE IN KEINER >NEW..< ZEILE STEHEN ; Find variables in the NEW lists in routines - list if used but not newed ; Also considers NEW (...) lists. ; ; Inputs : ; YROUTINE Routine name (Null = all IN* routines?) ; YVARIABLE Variable name to be found (Null = all variables in ^WWWZWS) ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 14-Nov-2007 GRF Doco; quits; FIXME ; 27.03.2001 FIS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DO ^WWWVAR
NEW DAT,USER,TRAKT,VARIABLE,ROUTINE,NR,ZNR,ZEILE
KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER)
SET DAT="" FOR SET DAT=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,DAT)) QUIT:DAT="" DO . SET USER="" . FOR SET USER=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,DAT,USER)) QUIT:USER="" DO . . SET TRAKT="" . . FOR SET TRAKT=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,DAT,USER,TRAKT)) QUIT:TRAKT="" DO . . . SET VARIABLE=$GET(YVARIABLE) . . . IF VARIABLE'="" IF '$DATA(^WWWZWS(0,DAT,USER,TRAKT,VARIABLE)) QUIT . . . ; . . . ;--------------------------------- . . . ; . . . DO:VARIABLE'="" FOR SET VARIABLE=$ORDER(^WWWZWS(0,DAT,USER,TRAKT,VARIABLE)) QUIT:VARIABLE="" DO . . . . ; . . . . QUIT:$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,VARIABLE)) . . . . SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,VARIABLE)="" . . . . ; . . . . ;SET ROUTINE="" FOR SET ROUTINE=$ORDER(^ROUTINE(ROUTINE)) QUIT:ROUTINE="" DO . . . . SET ROUTINE="IN" . . . . IF $GET(YROUTINE)'="" SET ROUTINE=$ORDER(^ROUTINE(YROUTINE),-1) . . . . ; . . . . ;------------------------------- . . . . ; . . . . ; FIXME : <GRF> if YROUTINE is null the only the first routine (if any) . . . . ; will be tested as it is likely there will be routines that start with . . . . ; something other than "IN" before we get to the "IN" ones. . . . . ; . . . . DO:$GET(YROUTINE)'="" IF $GET(YROUTINE)="" FOR SET ROUTINE=$ORDER(^ROUTINE(ROUTINE)) QUIT:ROUTINE="" QUIT:$EXTRACT(ROUTINE,1,2)'="IN" DO . . . . . QUIT:$EXTRACT(ROUTINE,1)="%" . . . . . ; . . . . . SET YQ(1)=0 ; 0=variable not newed 1=variable newed . . . . . SET YQ(2)=0 ; 0=variable not used 1=variable used . . . . . SET NR="" . . . . . FOR QUIT:YQ(1)=1 SET NR=$ORDER(^ROUTINE(ROUTINE,NR)) QUIT:NR="" DO . . . . . . SET ZNR="" . . . . . . FOR QUIT:YQ(1)=1 SET ZNR=$ORDER(^ROUTINE(ROUTINE,NR,ZNR)) QUIT:ZNR="" DO . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . SET ZEILE(ZNR)=$GET(^ROUTINE(ROUTINE,NR,ZNR)) . . . . . . . QUIT:ZEILE(ZNR)="" . . . . . . . SET ZEILE(ZNR)=$$^WWWUMLAU(ZEILE(ZNR),1) . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . IF $FIND(ZEILE(ZNR),"NEW ") DO . . . . . . . . IF $FIND(ZEILE(ZNR),"(") IF $FIND(ZEILE(ZNR),")") SET:'$FIND(ZEILE(ZNR),VARIABLE) YQ(1)=1 QUIT . . . . . . . . IF $FIND(ZEILE(ZNR),VARIABLE) SET YQ(1)=1 . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . ; FIXME : <GRF> Doesn't consider white space after variable name. . . . . . . . ; . . . . . . . IF $FIND(ZEILE(ZNR)," "_VARIABLE_"=") SET YQ(2)=1 . . . . . . ; . . . . . . QUIT:YQ(2)=0 ;VARIABLE WIRD NICHT IN ROUTINE BENUTZT ;Not within routine . . . . . . QUIT:YQ(1)=1 ;VARIABLE IST IN NEW-ZEILE AUFGEFÜHRT ;within . . . . . . ; . . . . . . WRITE YCR . . . . . . WRITE "VARIABLE: "_VARIABLE_" ROUTINE: "_ROUTINE
WRITE YCR WRITE "Examination finished" ;"Überprüfung beendet !" KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER)
QUIT
